summary: EnB settings that provide dark nights and dungeons, warm interiors and bright out doors.
descriptionHtml:
I was never happy with how all of the EnB presets seemed to be too bright in dungeons and blindingly bright out of doors. I have spent time tweaking the presets and ini\'s to get this final result. Its is a work in progress and I would appreciate any constructive feed back that you can give.

Basically, with the slew of wonderful torch/lantern mods out there, I wanted to make it so that you could have all the cool effects of EnB and still have a requirement for torches and lanterns in dungeons, rather than just being able to wander them without a source of light. This was the aim of the mod and so far, all looks well.

This mods works superbly with Climates of Tamriel and Wearable lanterns and I recommend both of those mods whole heartedly.

Wearable Lanterns: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416
Climates of Tamriel: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802

INSTALLATION

Simply drag and drop the files into your skyrim folder. (Let me know if any files are missing.)
author: Sansha
